name: mailbox
description: Allows for sending messages to other users, even if offline
author: astrsk

commands.name: inbox:read
commands.description: reads a letter in your inbox

args.name: letter number
args.description: number of the letter to read

commands.name: inbox:remove
commands.description: removes a letter from your inbox

args.name: letter number
args.description: number of the letter to remove

args.name: confirmation
args.description: confirms the clearing of your inbox

commands.name: send
commands.description: sends a letter to a player. Put names with spaces in quotes

args.name: name
args.description: name of player to send the letter to
